name: angular-prod-dev-setup
description: Angular2 Project Setup For Development And Production
author: sodhanalibrary <sodhanaware@gmail.com> (http://www.sodhanalibrary.com)

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/dependencies
scripts.start: tsc && concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "npm run lite"
scripts.build_prod: npm run build && browserify -s main production/main.prod.js > dist/bundle.js && npm run minify && cp -R css dist/css && cp production/index.html dist/ && npm run build_prod_depds
scripts.build_prod_depds: cp node_modules/core-js/client/shim.min.js dist/dependencies/ && cp node_modules/zone.js/dist/zone.js dist/dependencies/ && cp node_modules/reflect-metadata/Reflect.js dist/dependencies/ && cp node_modules/systemjs/dist/system.src.js dist/dependencies/ && cp systemjs.config.js dist/
